revised_title: In-depth Analysis of Peripatus Musculature and Innervation
tldr: The authors conducted a detailed study of the musculature and innervation of the Onychophoran Peripatus dominicae. They discovered significant differences in the anatomy compared to previous accounts, such as the presence of inner circular body wall muscle and a prominent levator of the leg. These findings contribute to understanding the evolution of arthropod locomotion and the phylogenetic position of Onychophora.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Invertebrate anatomy and physiology
